document_data.name: Railur's Red
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Railur's Red''' was a type of red [[ale]] found in the eastern coastal areas of [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]].
document_data.Description: Railur's Red was referred to as "red ale" but in reality it was amber in color. The libation's recipe was prepared using thrice-roasted [[barley]], citrus fruit rinds, and a collection of [[spices]].
